<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/42526</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>42526</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_296</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_296</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Juego del nim</string>
            <string language="en">Nim game</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nim Spiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu de Nim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo de Nim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco di Nim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδι Nim</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los sistemas de numeración en diferentes bases. Se utiliza para ello, como elemento motivador, los juegos NIM y, utilizando este recurso, se muestran cómo pueden hacerse cambios de base.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain numeral systems with different bases, using nim games as an introduction and explaining how changes of base can be carried out with this system.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">base</string>
            <string language="en">base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">juegos NIM</string>
            <string language="en">nim games</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">números</string>
            <string language="en">numbers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sistemas de numeración</string>
            <string language="en">numeral system</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Zahlsysteme mit unterschiedlichen Unterseiten, mit nim 
Spielen als Einleitung zu erklären und erklärend, wie Änderungen 
der Unterseite mit diesem System durchgeführt werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer des systèmes de numération avec différentes
bases, en utilisant des jeux de nim comme introduction et expliquant 
comment des changements de la base peuvent être effectués avec ce 
système.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
sistemas numerais com bases diferentes, usando jogos do nim como uma 
introdução e explicando como as mudanças da base podem ser 
realizadas com este sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare i sistemi numerali con differenti basi, usando i giochi del 
nim come introduzione e spiegando come i cambiamenti della base 
possono essere effettuati con questo sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει τα συστήματα αρίθμησης με τις διαφορετικές 
βάσεις, χρησιμοποιώντας nim τα παιχνίδια ως εισαγωγή και 
εξηγώντας πώς οι αλλαγές της βάσης μπορούν να πραγματοποιηθούν 
με αυτό το σύστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterseite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">nim Spiele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahlsystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeux de nim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nombres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système de numération</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogos do nim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">números</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema numeral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">giochi del nim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">numeri</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistema numerale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βάση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">nim παιχνίδια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αριθμοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύστημα αρίθμησης</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
